channel.title: Voice on Partially Attended
channel.description: Recent content in Voice on Partially Attended

item.title: Reaktor Breakpoint 2018 Ben Sauer, The rise of voice, and how to design for it - YouTube
item.description: This is a great overview of the sate of designing for voice. Ben is one the best designers / tech thinkers that I’ve ever worked with, and he gives a great overview of how to think about designing for voice in this talk. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSFkRG_ZMKo
